title: PVQ Response
description: Validates responses to the US Federal Personnel Vetting Questionnaire

enum: A U.S. citizen by birth in the U.S. or a U.S. territory.
A U.S. citizen by birth, born to U.S. parent(s), in a foreign country.
A U.S. national by birth in the U.S. or a U.S. territory.
A U.S. national by birth, born to U.S. parent(s), in a foreign country.
Form FS-240 (Consular Report of Birth Abroad)
Form DS-1350 (Certificate of Report of Birth)
Form N-560 or Form N-561 (Certificate of Citizenship)
Business or professional conference (This does not include U.S. Government business or military assignments.)
Trade show, conference, or seminar (not associated with your profession)
Not in-person (for example, correspondence, online, extension, other similar distance learning education)
Combination of in-person and not in-person
Professional degree (for example, MD, JD, DVM)
U.S. Military or Uniformed Service (U.S. Army, Navy, Marine, Coast Guard, Air Force, Space Force, USPHS, or NOAA)
National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Commissioned Officer Corps
U.S. Public Health Service Commissioned Corps
Removed from position, but not from employment
General Discharge Under Honorable Conditions (this is not an Honorable Discharge)
Other Type of Separation (Entry-Level Separation, Medical Separation, Separation for Convenience of the Government)
Charge dismissed or disposed of after a deferred adjudication or deferred judgment (not applicable for military under the UCMJ)
Cocaine or crack cocaine (such as rock or freebase)
Stimulants (such as amphetamines, speed, crystal meth, or ecstasy)
Depressants (such as barbiturates, methaqualone, or tranquilizers)
Ketamine (such as special K or jet)
Narcotics (such as opium, morphine, codeine, or heroin)
Hallucinogenic (such as LSD, PCP, or mushrooms)
Steroids (such as the clear or juice)
Inhalants (such as toluene or amyl nitrate)
I'm using a credit counseling service, debt consolidation service, or other similar service to resolve this debt.
I'm on an IRS short term payment plan (paying in 180 days or less).
I'm on an IRS long-term payment plan (installment agreement--I pay monthly).
The IRS temporarily delayed collecting my taxes due to financial hardship.
I'm using a credit counseling service debt consolidation service or other similar service to resolve my tax debt.
Single (never in a civil marriage civil union domestic partnership or common law marriage)
In a civil marriage civil union domestic partnership or common law marriage
Form N-550 or Form N-570 (Certificate of Naturalization)
Form I-551 (Permanent Resident Card/Resident Alien Card)
Certificate of Citizenship (Form N-560 or Form N-561)
Permanent Resident Card/Resident Alien Card (Form I-551)
I-20 Certificate of Eligibility for Non-Immigrant-F1-Student
DS-2019 Certificate of Eligibility of Exchange Visitor-J1-Status
Electronic means (for example email texting chat rooms)
Chapter 12 (Adjustment of Debts of a Family Farmer with Regular Annual Income)
Chapter 13 (Adjustment of Debts of an Individual with Regular Annual Income)
Real estate, land, property (other than your primary residence)
You (a general lien against you as an individual)
Fulfill a home loan agreement (mortgage lien)
Fulfill an auto loan agreement (auto lien)
Pay for medical services after receiving a personal injury award
Pay condominium or homeowner's association fees
Pay a mechanic, laborer, or material provider (i.e., contractor's lien, mechanic's lien, construction lien)
Residence that I cosigned for or was guarantor for
Rent-to-own items (e.g., appliances, electronics, furniture, jewelry, etc.)
Property tax (for example, real estate property)
Personal property tax (for example, for a car or boat)
I'm using a credit counseling service, debt consolidation service, or other similar service to help resolve my debt.
I am successfully meeting the terms of a payment plan.
I'm using a credit counseling service, debt consolidation service, or other similar service to resolve this financial obligation.
I completed additional training or counseling.
I'm using my agency's or employer's Employee Assistance Program (EAP).
I had to do other remedies
Foreign Movement (such as a social, political, or religious movement)
They are not associated with any of the above.

Exchange traded funds (ETFs) held in specific geographical or economic sectors
